item.title: Manjaro kernel management
item.description: mhwd-kernel -li sudo mhwd-kernel -i linux313 sudo mhwd-kernel -i linux313 rmc //替换当前内核 sudo mhwd-kernel -r linux39 sudo pacman -R linux39-headers sudo pacman -R linux39-extramodules sudo pacman -R linux39 linux39-headers linux39-extramodules
